Dictionary.main_menu_support_button: Hey, some important stuff down here
Dictionary.main_menu_support_panel_0: I want to thank everyone who supports Ukraine!
Dictionary.main_menu_support_panel_1: It may seem something far away and not important. But we are grateful for any support. It literally saves lives.
Dictionary.main_menu_support_panel_2: Even though I live in one of the most safe cities in Ukraine some rockets still explode near my house. It was twice during this Jam btw.
Dictionary.main_menu_support_panel_3: Blackouts became a regular thing in our country. And I guess the winter will be tough.
Dictionary.main_menu_support_panel_4: For those who want to help here is an international support platform for donations: u24.gov.ua
Dictionary.main_menu_info_panel_0: This game was made for 20 Second Game Jam
Dictionary.main_menu_info_panel_1: You play as a Mage who did something wrong with the potion and now have 20 seconds to escape the tower
Dictionary.main_menu_info_panel_2: But the lock keeps the door closed. Find what it needs and give it to the lock
Dictionary.main_menu_info_panel_3:
You can play with your keyboard:
Move - WASD
Interact - E
Or with a gamepad:
Move - Left Stick
Interact - Y (north button)
Dictionary.main_menu_info_panel_4:

www.kenney.nl - free sounds
